ASPOSE_DLL_EXPORT pplx::task<HttpContent> com::aspose::api::ConversionApi::getConvertDocumentToImage ( utility::string_t  name,
utility::string_t  outFormat,
boost::optional< int32_t >  width,
boost::optional< int32_t >  height,
boost::optional< int32_t >  leftMargin,
boost::optional< int32_t >  rightMargin,
boost::optional< int32_t >  topMargin,
boost::optional< int32_t >  bottomMargin,
boost::optional< int32_t >  resolution,
boost::optional< utility::string_t >  folder,
boost::optional< utility::string_t >  storage 
)

Convert the HTML, EPUB, SVG document from the storage by its name to the specified image format.

Parameters:
name Document name(html,epub,svg formats).
outFormat Resulting image format(jpeg, png, bmp, tiff, gif).
width Resulting image width in points (1/96 inch). (optional)
height Resulting image height in points (1/96 inch). (optional)
leftMargin Left resulting image margin in points (1/96 inch). (optional)
rightMargin Right resulting image margin in points (1/96 inch). (optional)
topMargin Top resulting image margin in points (1/96 inch). (optional)
bottomMargin Bottom resulting image margin in points (1/96 inch). (optional)
resolution Resolution of resulting image. Default is 96 dpi. (optional)
folder The source document folder. (optional)
storage The source document storage. (optional)

Converts the HTML, EPUB, SVG document (in request content) to the specified image format and uploads resulting file to storage.

Parameters:
outPath Full resulting filename (ex. /folder1/folder2/result.jpg)
outFormat Resulting image format(jpeg, png, bmp, tiff, gif).
file A file to be converted.
width Resulting document page width in points (1/96 inch). (optional)

)

Converts the HTML, EPUB, SVG document (located on storage) to XPS and uploads resulting file to storage.

Parameters:
name Document name(html, epub, svg formats).
outPath Full resulting filename (ex. /folder1/folder2/result.xps)
width Resulting document page width in points (1/96 inch). (optional)
height Resulting document page height in points (1/96 inch). (optional)
leftMargin Left resulting document page margin in points (1/96 inch). (optional)
rightMargin Right resulting document page margin in points (1/96 inch). (optional)
topMargin Top resulting document page margin in points (1/96 inch). (optional)
bottomMargin Bottom resulting document page margin in points (1/96 inch). (optional)
folder The source document folder. (optional)
storage The source and resulting document storage. (optional)

ASPOSE_DLL_EXPORT pplx::task<HttpContent> com::aspose::api::ConversionApi::putConvertMarkdownToHtml ( utility::string_t  name,
utility::string_t  outPath,
boost::optional< utility::string_t >  folder,
boost::optional< utility::string_t >  storage 
)

Converts the Markdown document (located on storage) to HTML and uploads resulting file to storage by specified path.

Parameters:
name Document name.
outPath Full resulting file path in the storage (ex. /folder1/folder2/result.html)
folder The source document folder. (optional)
storage The source and resulting document storage. (optional)
